short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will detect all HubSpot forms and expose all hidden fields.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
hubspot-form-analyzer is a lightweight extension for Chrome and Chromium-based browsers that scans your webpages for HubSpot forms and exposes hidden fields when available.

This extension can be helpful when debugging HubSpot forms.
When a HubSpot form is detected, it will automatically highlight the hidden fields and show a direct 'edit' and 'account' link to reach the form and HubSpot account easily.
